Curious about different technologies

今天看到OpenAI的blog，主要讲解Evolution Strategies，然后顺着Andrej提供的简单实例，自己修改了一下用来求解CartPole-v0。几个有用的链接：

  1. Blog of Evolution Strategies as a Scalable Alternative to Reinforcement Learning
  2. Paper of Evolution Strategies as a Scalable Alternative to Reinforcement Learning
